channel.title: Crash at begining of bm_C2a2c
channel.description: Hello, I would like to report a crash at the beginning of level bm_C2a2c. Immediately after the level loads, I experience a crash to desktop with the message "hl2.exe has stopped working". Attached is the mdmp file. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T21_31_3C0.mdmp (96.8 KB)

item.title: Crash at begining of bm_C2a2c
item.dc:creator: drkleiner
item.description:
Hello,

I would like to report a crash at the beginning of level bm_C2a2c. Immediately after the level loads, I experience a crash to desktop with the message “hl2.exe has stopped working”.

Attached is the mdmp file.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T21_31_3C0.mdmp (96.8 KB)

Read full topic
